instructions.name: Setup route
instructions.description: Sets up a route for the HTTP server.

parameters.name: onHttpRequest
parameters.description: Function to be called when the route is matched

parameters.name: onWebSocketConnection
parameters.description: Function to be called when the WebSocket connection is established

parameters.name: onWebSocketMessage
parameters.description: Function to be called when the route is matched

parameters.name: onWebSocketDisconnection
parameters.description: Function to be called when the WebSocket is closed

parameters.name: onMessage
parameters.description: Function to be called when the actor receives a new message

instructions.name: Accept WebSocket
instructions.description: In order to communicate over a WebSocket, the HTTP connection needs to be upgraded to a WebSocket. Use this action in request handler in WebSocket service to upgrade the connection to allow further communication over WebSocket.

instructions.name: Send message
instructions.description: Sends a message over a WebSocket. If no name is provided, the scoped WebSocket will be used. If no WebSocket is found the action will fail.

instructions.name: Close WebSocket
instructions.description: Sends a closing message and terminates a connection consuming WebSocket resource. If no name is provided, the scoped WebSocket will be used. If no WebSocket is found the action will fail.

description: WebSocket is a computer communications protocol, providing full-duplex communication channels over a single TCP connection.
